details.title: Assembling a distributed fused information-based human-computer cognitive decision making tool
details.abstract: A human presented with a variety of displays is expected to fuse data to obtain information. An effective presentation of information would assist the human in fusing data. This paper describes a multisensor-multisource information decision making tool designed to augment human cognitive fusion.
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine

keywords: distributed fused human-computer decision making tool
